fullText: Alfred Molina and Eddie Redmayne deliver powerhouse performances in this riveting drama about artist Mark Rothko and his young assistant in his Bowery studio.
dtliExcerpt: Alfred Molina and Eddie Redmayne deliver powerhouse performances in this riveting drama about artist Mark Rothko and his young assistant in his Bowery studio.
